resources.string:
"语音唤醒开关已开启
请问是否开启声纹识别功能 ?"
"You can say \"小爱同学\" now to wake Mi AI."
When the screen is on, you can say \"小爱同学\" to wake Mi AI.
"You'll be able to wake Mi AI with your voice after this."
"You'll be able to wake Mi AI with your voice when the screen is on after this."
"move to a quiet place and say \"小爱同学\" into your phone. Don't bring your phone too close to your face."
Looks like another app is using the microphone now. Close this app and try again.
"You'll be able to find your device using your voice after you finish recording."
"Move to a quiet place and say \"小爱你在哪\" into your phone. Don't bring your phone too close to your face."
"Mi AI's response includes animations, flashlight, vibration, and sound. Press any button or tap the screen to silence the response."
"Done! You can say \"小爱你在哪\" to find your device now."
Say \"小爱你在哪\" to get a response from Mi AI
"Can't use the service due to restricted permissions"
"Higher sensitivity allows Mi AI to respond faster. However, it also increases the chances of triggerring Mi AI when you don't need it."
"Couldn't record greeting. Try to record again."
Done! When the screen is on, you can say\"小爱同学\" to wake Mi AI.
"Done! You can say \"小爱同学\" now to wake Mi AI."
"Can't wake Mi AI with voice while in Second space"
Say \"小爱同学\" to wake Mi AI
This feature works when the screen is on or turned off while music is playing.
此功能为亮屏唤醒，亮屏状态下才能唤醒小爱同学哦~
开启后，小爱同学就能识别你的声音了
亮屏后，对手机说 \"小爱同学\"，即可唤醒我
"You can say \"小爱同学\" now to wake Mi AI."
